0.6.1 - 2014-10-12
------------------
* Improve spatialite_finder.py and check for more spatialite shared lib
  names
* Set version for all scripts


0.6 - 2014-10-11
----------------
* New script: gpx2spatialite_updatelocs
* Add option to supress commandline output
* Lots of under the hood changes


0.5 - 2014-01-05
----------------
* Initial release as python package.
